result.reason: Filtering should search within collapsed folders to ensure users can find all connections. If matches are found in collapsed folders, those folders must expand to reveal the results.
result.approach: Update the filtering logic in ConnectionTree.cs to traverse all nodes, including those in collapsed folders. When a filter is active, ensure that matching nodes trigger their parent folders to expand so they are visible.

attempts.raw_output:
{
"decision": "implement",
"reason": "Filtering should search within collapsed folders to ensure users can find all connections. If matches are found in collapsed folders, those folders must expand to reveal the results.",
"priority": "P3-enhancement",
"estimated_files": ["mRemoteNG/UI/Controls/ConnectionTree.cs"],
"approach": "Update the filtering logic in ConnectionTree.cs to traverse all nodes, including those in collapsed folders. When a filter is active, ensure that matching nodes trigger their parent folders to expand so they are visible."
